item.title: See this page fetch itself, byte by byte, over TLS
item.description: - The page demonstrates a live, annotated https: request for its own source, showcasing a pure-JS implementation of TLS 1.3 called subtls.

item.title: Ask HN: What is new in algorithms & data structures these days?
item.description: - The post discusses the latest trends in algorithms and data structures within the tech industry.

item.title: Tell HN: We should start to add "ai.txt" as we do for "robots.txt"
item.description: - The author suggests creating an "ai.txt" file to provide guidelines for how artificial intelligence (AI) should interact with websites.

item.title: The Leverage of LLMs for Individuals
item.description: - GPT-4 is a powerful AI language model that can help individuals create and innovate without the expectation of immediate returns.

item.title: Google I/O 2023
item.description: - Google I/O 2023 took place recently and the keynotes are available for viewing.

item.title: YouTube tests blocking videos unless you disable ad blockers
item.description: - YouTube is testing an experiment that asks users to disable their ad blockers or pay for a premium subscription to watch videos.

item.title: My friends who cheated in interviews are getting promoted (2022)
item.description: - The user's friends cheated in job interviews and were subsequently hired at companies like Amazon and Salesforce.

item.title: Why I'm done with Mouser Electronics
item.description: - The author is disappointed in Mouser Electronics, a preeminent online component retailer in the United States that they have recommended for two decades because of a series of comical mishaps in the past 10 months.

item.title: Infosec company pwned by 4chan user
item.description: - A cyber risk assessment company, Optimeyes, has been completely owned by an anonymous 4chan user.

item.title: Tell HN: The "Y" logo in the top-left corner has been upgraded to SVG
item.description: - The Y logo of Hacker News, located in the top-left corner of the interface, has received an upgrade to the scalable vector graphics (SVG) format.
